snippet: A federal appeals court had demanded that the administration explain the president’s remarks about judicial review of the health care overhaul.
abstract: Obama administration backpedals after federal appeals court demands that the administration explain the president's remarks about the Supreme Court's review of the health care overhaul.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court had demanded that the administration explain the president’s remarks about judicial review of the health care overhaul.

headline.seo: Obama Concedes That Courts Can Review Acts of Congress
headline.print_headline: Administration Tells a Court It Doesn’t Deny Its Powers
